name: Recraft
description: Generate and edit images using Recraft
long_description: This is MCP Server integrating MCP Clients with Recraft raster and vector image operations: image generation and editing, creating custom styles and generating images in them, vectorization of raster images, image background removal and replacement, image upscaling.

tools.name: generate_image
tools.description: Generate an image using Recraft from a text prompt.

tools.name: create_style
tools.description: Create a style in Recraft from the set of style reference images.

tools.name: vectorize_image
tools.description: Vectorize an input image using Recraft.

tools.name: image_to_image
tools.description: Generate an image using Recraft from an input image and a text prompt.

tools.name: remove_background
tools.description: Remove background in the input image using Recraft.

tools.name: replace_background
tools.description: Generate an image using Recraft from an input image with its detected background replaced based on the prompt.

tools.name: crisp_upscale
tools.description: Crisp upscale of the input image using Recraft.

tools.name: creative_upscale
tools.description: Creative upscale of the input image using Recraft.

tools.name: get_user
tools.description: Get information about the current Recraft API user.

RECRAFT_API_KEY.title: Recraft API key
RECRAFT_API_KEY.description: Recraft API key can be obtained at https://www.recraft.ai/profile/api

RECRAFT_REMOTE_RESULTS_STORAGE.title: Store generated images remotely
RECRAFT_REMOTE_RESULTS_STORAGE.description: If true, generated images will be stored remotely instead of locally

IMAGE_STORAGE_DIRECTORY.title: Image Storage Directory
IMAGE_STORAGE_DIRECTORY.description: Local directory where all generated images will be stored
